com.facebook.react.modules.netinfo

类 NetInfoModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContextBaseJavaModule
        • com.facebook.react.modules.netinfo.NetInfoModule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LifecycleEventListener, NativeModule

    public class NetInfoModule
extends ReactContextBaseJavaModule
implements LifecycleEventListener
    Module that monitors and provides information about the connectivity state of the device.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onHostResume

        public void onHostResume()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called either when the host activity receives a resume event (e.g. Activity#onResume or if the native module that implements this is initialized while the host activity is already resumed. Always called for the most current activity.
        指定者:
        onHostResume 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener

      • onHostPause

        public void onHostPause()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called when host activity receives pause event (e.g. Activity#onPause. Always called for the most current activity.
        指定者:
        onHostPause 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener

      • onHostDestroy

        public void onHostDestroy()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called when host activity receives destroy event (e.g. Activity#onDestroy. Only called for the last React activity to be destroyed.
        指定者:
        onHostDestroy 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        从接口复制的说明: NativeModule
        This is called at the end of CatalystApplicationFragment#createCatalystInstance() after the CatalystInstance has been created, in order to initialize NativeModules that require the CatalystInstance or JS modules.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 NativeModule
        覆盖:
        initialize 在类中 BaseJavaModule

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 NativeModule
        返回:
        the name of this module. This will be the name used to require() this module from javascript.
